headline: Why Is Align Technology (ALGN) Down 21.2% Since Last Earnings Report?
summary: Align Technology (ALGN) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: ALGN Stock Gains on Addition of Upgrades to the iTero Lumina Solutions
summary: Align Technology adds restorative capabilities to the iTero Lumina Solutions - the iTero Lumina intraoral scanner and the iTero Lumina Pro dental imaging system.

headline: Align Technology: Brace Yourself, This Stock Is Undervalued
summary: Align Technology is undervalued despite strong market shares, premium pricing power, and growing EPS. Click here to find out why I rate ALGN is a Strong Buy.
